other_title: Ataque a los titanes: Junior High (Spanish)
L'Attaque des Titans - Junior High School (French)
plot: The parody re-imagines Eren, Mikasa, Armin, and other characters from the original manga as students and teachers at Titan Junior High School.
opening_theme: "Seishun wa Hanabi no Yō ni" (青春は花火のように; Youth is Like Fireworks) by Linked Horizon
ending_theme: "Hangeki no Daichi" (反撃の大地; Earth's Counterattack) by Yuuki Kaji, Kishô Taniyama, and Yui Ishikawa
